choices: Lunchtime comes, Tina stops by his cubicle to take him and eat him, but how?
His boss Gina wants to see him right away in her office, what could she want?
153132222.content:
With a gasping rush, Rick woke and sat up in his bed. He looked around and noticed that he was in the room of his apartment. He looked down and felt over his body, he was apparently all there. He thought for a moment; the last thing he remembered was seeing Kara's terrifying but lovely open mouth as she stuffed him in it and bite down. He wondered if he really became her lunch or if he just had a wild dream. He realized that he was naked, he also felt that he had a slight headache. He decided to chalk the whole experience up to that he had drunk too much the night before and he dreamed the whole occurrence. He actually wished it had been Tina that ate him in the dream. Rick got up, took a shower, and went to get dressed, because he noticed that if he did get moving he would be late for work.
         When getting dressed he noticed that his favorite work shirt he had planned to wear that day and his jeans he had set out, were gone. He guessed that he had already worn them the day before and that they must be in the clothes hamper, so he just got a regular work shirt and another pair of jeans. He couldn't find his car keys, but then he remembered that he had taken his car to the repair shop a few days ago. He was finally ready; he left his apartment building and headed for the bus stop. He was happy that he at least made it to the office building on time. He thought it strange though that when he entered the building that women were looking at him funny. He guessed that he had forgotten to brush his hair or something was on his clothes, but after inspection nothing was out of place. He rode the elevator to his floor and went to his cubicle. He was puzzled to find his favorite work shirt and the rest of his missing clothes laying on the floor of his cubicle. Then he turned as he heard a woman shriek and drop a bunch of papers. It was Kara, her mouth was wide open is shock. She then closed it, but opened it again to mutter, "B-b-b-but, I ate you for lunch yesterday. H-h-how is this possible, I chewed you up and digested you."
         Rick then heard a joyful shout. He turned and saw Tina, she ran toward him and gave him a big hug. She put a hand on his head and practically shoved his face in between her breasts, "I thought I lost you. This is amazing, Kara must have been lying when she told everybody at the end of the day that she had eaten you on a sandwich for her lunch." "No, no, no," Kara shouted, "Look at the clothes in his cubicle, they are the same ones he had been wearing yesterday, I shrunk and ate him for lunch, he was delicious! I know I did it!" Tina giggled, "You know what, I bet Rick has that strange new power that was discovered not too long ago. I read a scientific article a few weeks ago that said that a woman scientist discovered that her boyfriend, that she decided to get rid of by eating him, reformed the next day back at the house that they shared. She was startled like you are Kara, so to try and prove if she had just dreamed eating him the first time, she ate him again. She said she ended up doing a scientific study for three weeks where each day she ate him a different way with different foods. She said she even tested if she was the problem, by feeding him to several of her female co-workers and all of her girlfriends. It turned out that every single time he reformed nude and unharmed each day in her bed. She said that she wasn't sure, but she hypothesized that there might be other people out there that don't have the swallow and shrink power, but do have this immortal reform power. She also said that these people won't feel pain very well, if at all, so it won't feel bad to them if the get cooked, or digested alive in a stomach."
         "Wow," Rick said, "I guess I am one of those special people. Oh, about yesterday, I heard what you said about me, I would love to be your boyfriend." Tina blushed, "Okay, yes. I'm glad you heard that, I like you a lot, perhaps love you. But now I know it isn't a risk to date you, I can't harm you or have to worry that some other girl will end you." Kara laughed, "Well, it is very good he has this new power, because it won't be long for the whole building to know he has it. And when that happens, every woman in this place will want a crack at eating him to test if he will come back the next day, I know I will. Mmmm, Rick, maybe you would like to come by my place sometime and let me make you dinner. Hmm, you can come too Tina, we'll shrink, prep, and roast him in my oven and we can dine on him together." Tina hugged Rick again, "Oh maybe another time much later, I'm going to keep him close for the next week or so, so if anybody is going to dine on him, it will be just me." "Since I know I have a chance of surviving," Rick said to Tina, "How about when lunchtime comes today, you can let me feed your lovely belly." Tina giggle, "Well, we will see my new tasty honey boy." Kara did her best to get back to work, as well as Tina and Rick.

What happened next?

1531322222.title: "A Special Promotion"

15313222222.content: This is odd. Rick should be dead and back in bed by now. For some odd reason, Gina isn't digesting him. He looked around and realized that her stomach wasn't even releasing acid. He saw traces of chewed - but undigested - food lining her stomach. Then he remembered that Gina had been seeming hungrier than usual lately. It appeared to Rick that some disease was stopping her stomach from producing gastric acid, rendering all of her eating useless. Rick realized that he had to be the only person who knew about this - and that there were only two ways to let anyone know.
15313222222.title: Gina's Indigestion

choices: Go into the bathroom
Try to slip under the door
153132222221.content:
Rick suffocates himself in Gina's stomach lining. It's working...he can feel himself dying...

He wakes up, naked, in his bed, like 'usual'. However, something was different today. He had awoken already shrunk, the bedroom door was locked, and he could hear sounds from the bathroom. It sounded like Tina sobbing. What now?
153132222221.title: Suffocation

153132222222.content:
Rick explored her passageways until he found a dead end. It must be her butt. He climbed through and found that his suspicions were confirmed. He was inside of his boss's panties.

He climbed out. She is having a doctor look at her for her hunger pangs. The doctor sees Rick and asks Gina, "Is this the one you said you ate?"

"Yes!" exclaims Gina. "How did you get here?"

Rick explained to the doctor and Gina about the notable lack of stomach acid. The doctor said, "Of course! I have seen this before. There is only one cure, and it requires just such a person as Rick. First, we have to have him sign a waiver stating that his new home is your stomach and his new default size is three feet."

"WHAT!?" exclaimed Rick.

"Yes. Second, you must consume enough food for slightly more than two people from now on. Rick must ... stay ... in your stomach at all times.

"WHAT!?" exclaimed both Rick and Gina.

"But surely there must be some alternative!" suggested Gina desperately.

"There is one," said the doctor.

"What?" asked Rick.

"Death," said the doctor simply.

Rick and Gina looked at each other. They both knew that they had to go through with it. For the rest of Rick's life, he lived in Gina's stomach. She rarely ever swallowed other people now, but when she did, they passed through her like Rick did. Once, as a final gift to Rick, she downed Tina whole. Tina, being full-sized, crushed and ate Rick several times before Gina was forced to belch her out. Other than that, it was only the occasional man or even rarer woman, lucky that he/she was downed by someone with this rare syndrome. Thus passed the rest of Rick's years. When Gina died (eaten by Kayla), Rick's immortality finally faded, and he became one with Kayla at last.
153132222222.title: Permanent Undersecretary

info.brief_description: A world where people are shrunk and eaten or same-size swallowed.
info.description:
This is a grouping of many different stories. In the world some people have the power to swallow other people whole or shrink them between 3 and 20 inches, and then back to normal if they want. People without the power are seen as toys or food, mostly food.
--------
I thought it was time to release another quality shrink and vore interactive. I keep coming back here to see if other people are picking up the slack and writing some of their own using the classic and best style, which put shrink and vore interactive on the map. All the ones I write are written in that classic style. I see so many people just drop off a one chapter interactive and expect people to add to it, to those people, the reason people don't add is because you don't develop your story and characters before you release it. People won't add if they only have a few sentences of info to go off of. For the people I do see add to their own interactives, they don't go into great detail about things, but if they do they focus on the non-important details or over detail things. Another big problem I see with the new shrink and vore interactives being made is that they have the rules where there is to be no death or harm to the characters, and the story's characters end up being love and kisses nice and nothing dramatic happens. With shrink and vore interactives, if you remove the possibility that the main character can get hurt or die, you lose all conflict and problems with the situations; all stories have problems and conflicts put into them, the stories that don't are snore-fests and have absolutely no appeal to readers. I do have stories where characters become immortal and can't be hurt, but I always add that there is a possible chance that the character's immortality and no pain powers can disappear.

Lastly, I see see interactives that don't have enough rules to guide people to make better editions to the interactives. Also, even with the ones that have rules, I don't see enforcement of the rules. For me, major rule violation means deletion of edition. Besides it makes no sense to make an edition that you know will get deleted.
So without any further delay:

The Rules: (Follow them to the letter or get deleted.)

1.) No gay stuff, so no interaction between guys. Only one guy per story ark. Besides it is illegal in the world of the story for guys to do anything to each other. Interaction between girls is just fine because it is hot.
2.) No animals, insects, bugs, reptiles, etc, etc; meaning only plain ordinary awesome humans. Also No, characters from cartoons, anime, TV in general, video games, etc, etc. Characters are to be totally original made from the writer’s mind.
3.) The age range for characters is, 16 to 35 for females.
4.) The ways that people can be killed; swallowed whole same size, shrunk and eaten by swallowing or chewing, cooked then eaten, sat on, crushed by breasts, or crushed while being used for sexual purposes. If a person is eaten with food, like being on a sandwich, there is to be no meat. The idea is that the person is the meat.
5.) If there is toilet stuff, there is to be no mentioning of crap or pee. On other note, no foot play, no interaction with feet, unless the person is getting the attention(tapping the foot nothing else) or just using it to climb the person.
6.) The shrinking limit, 3 to 20 inches. When a person is shrunk, his or her clothes don’t shrink with him or her.
7.) Editions are to be written in the third person prospective; for example: Jason climbed up onto the couch.
8.) I am being a nice by reducing the sentence minimum to five good sentences, no less, but more would be better. And, don't use what is first put in the title blank, create your own original title.
9.) Use a spell checker, like Microsoft Word, on your editions. I will not tolerate
misspelled words and bad grammar.

Please add, follow the rules and make it count.
